frame.name: Bearing_arms
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Protagonist</fen> has (or does not have) a <fen>Weapon</fen>. The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is armed may also be described. The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is normally a human but may be a device that has subsidiary weapons. <ex>Apparently, <fex name="Protagonist">the suspect</fex> <m>is</m> <t>armed</t> <fex name="Weapon">with a shotgun</fex>.</ex> <ex>After she pulled the .45 from her sock drawer, <fex name="Protagonist">she</fex> <m>felt</m> <fex name="Degree">well enough</fex> <t>armed</t> <fex name="Degree">to face anyone coming in</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Protagonist">The Tomahawk missile</fex> <t>packs</t> a lot of heat .</ex>
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">An individual with a right-to-carry license</fex> may continue to <t>carry</t> in a "school zone" in compliance with existing state and local laws. <fex name="Weapon">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of Weapons that the Protagonist has (relative to some standard). <ex>He is very <fex name="Degree">well</fex> <t>armed</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Weapon
FE.definition: <def-root>The destructive device that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has with them.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> carries a <fen>Weapon</fen>.</def-root>
